DataElement.preferredName: Person Current Household Cigarette Passive Smoke Exposure Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number of cigarettes per day there was current exposure to cigarette, finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking, smoke products by a person living in the same house in a person who does not smoke.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Current Household Cigarette Passive Smoke Exposure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the current exposure to cigarette, finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking, smoke products by a person living in the same house in a person who does not smoke.

Property.preferredName: Current Household Cigarette Passive Smoke Exposure
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes. Household is a common unit for classifying population data.:Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI):Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.
Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.
Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ReferenceDocuments.name: On average, how many cigarett
ReferenceDocuments.description: On average, how many cigarettes per day are smoked by other people while you are at home
